BitVector¶

class bitvec.BitVector(w=0)[source]¶

Represents a binary word of a certain size, but less or equal to 16 bits unsigned.

Parameters

_w (int, private) – Codec the value of BitVector

extract_field_s(mask)[source]¶

Apply a mask over the seld and extract selected bits. The result is a signed value.

Parameters

mask – Binary mask

Returns

Postive or negative integrer

Return type

int

extract_field_u(mask)[source]¶

Apply a mask over the self and extract the selected bits. The result is an unsigned value.

For example:

self - 0b10100110 mask - 0b00110011 result - 0b00001010

Parameters

mask (integrer, binary) – Binary mask

Returns

Postive integrer

Return type

int

class bitvec.Byte(w=0)[source]¶

Represents a word of 8 bits

class bitvec.Word(w=0)[source]¶

Represent a word of 16 bits

lsb()[source]¶

Return the less significant byte

msb()[source]¶

Return the most significant byte
